content: popcorn vines designer aurora suominen/dragonflymomof2 designs©2015 size 6 square using hook h/5 0mm yarn worsted weight in 2 colors a & b ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ______________________________________________________________ abbreviations & stitches used beg=beginning chain=chain slip_stitch=slip_stitch single_crochet=single_crochet ​ ​ ​ ​ space=spaces skip=skip w/=with double_crochet=double_crochet ​ ​ ​ ​ st s =stitch es lps=loops fpdc=front post double_crochet fptrc=front post triple crochet ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ popcorn=popcorn bpsc=back post single_crochet ​ ​ ​ ___________________________________________________________ notes bold print repeated in pattern sts work in next st/chsp join join w/slip_stitch in ​​​ ​​ ​​ ​ ​ ​ ​​ beg st unless otherwise stated popcorn 4dc in st remove hook insert hook in 1st double_crochet ​ ​ worked grab lps from 4th double_crochet and pull through round 1 w/a ch4 9dc in 4th chain from hook join 10dc round 2 ch3 fpdc in same st double_crochet fpdc in next st repeat around join 20sts round 3 ch3 double_crochet in same st fpdc in next st 2dc in next st repeat around ending w/fpdc join 30sts aurora suominen/dragonflymomof2designs ©copyright 2015 all rights reserved popcorn vines 1 round 4 ch3 double_crochet in between next 2dc double_crochet in next st popcorn in next st double_crochet in next st repeat around ending w/popcorn in last st join 30dc 10pc round 5 ch3 to the left of your work fptrc in the fp st of round 3 popcorn in next st double_crochet in 3sts repeat around ending w/double_crochet in last 2sts join 30dc 10trc 10pc round 6 ch1 bpsc in same st ch1 skip next st skip popcorn bpsc in next 3sts repeat around ending w/bpsc in last 2sts switch to b w/slip_stitch to join 30sc sts means any st/space this rnds works on both round 7 ch3 double_crochet ch1 2dc in same st beg corner made double_crochet in st half_double_crochet in 7sts double_crochet in ​ ​ next st 2dc ch1 2dc in next st corner made 4x minus last corner join 24dc ​ ​ 28hdc round 8 slip_stitch in next 2sts beg corner double_crochet in next 13sts corner in next space 4x minus last corner join 68dc
